turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to place an order at Peet's coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like an iced caffe mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it large with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: one in Ashburn, Virginia in the Brambleton Town Center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great and what peets did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a large iced caffe mocha with 2% milk from the peets in the Brambleton town center, Ashton Virginia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. I'll place it right now. It'll be ready for pickup in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You'll get the reciept via text, have a good day.
